law.catch_line: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
law.text: KRS 387.810 to 387.854 modify, limit, and supersede the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, 15 U.S.C. sec. 7001 et seq., but do not modify, limit, or supersede Section 101(c) of that Act, 15 U.S.C. sec. 7001(c), or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in Section 103(b) of that Act, 15 U.S.C. sec. 7003(b).
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 22, effective June 8, 2011.
